attributes.action: Ask Karen Lumley to resign as Redditch MP with a vote of no confidence in her
attributes.background: Local MP Karen Lumley has done very little to help keep the Maternity and children's ward open at the Alex hospital in Redditch which is in her  constituency

rejection.details:
We can't accept this petition because it asks for something that neither the House of Commons nor the Government can do. 

The resignation of an individual MP is not a decision for the Government or Parliament. 

The expression "vote of no confidence" is used when talking about a vote in the House of Commons which tests whether or not the Government of the day has the confidence of a majority of MPs in the House of Commons. That's why we allow petitions asking for a vote of no confidence in the Government or in individual Ministers. The concept of the House having “confidence” in someone does not apply to backbench or Opposition MPs.
